statements: DELETE FROM similarity_scores WHERE word1_id = '7298cf24-325d-4f9e-9e03-bbbcadcd373a' AND word2_id = '5bbf9d7f-6c8d-4a1e-83e1-4b322f1ec42b';
DELETE FROM similarity_scores WHERE score < 0.5 AND word1 = 'apple';
DELETE FROM similarity_scores WHERE word1 = 'orange' AND word2 = 'banana';
DELETE FROM word_synonyms WHERE word = 'orange' AND synonym = 'citrus';
DELETE FROM word_synonyms WHERE synonym = 'juice' AND word = 'orange';
DELETE FROM words WHERE id = 10 OR id = 20;
